H3.text: who won the battle of britain in ww2. British

A4.text: The Battle of Britain marked the first major defeat of Germany's military forces.

A5.text: The Royal Air Force (RAF) and the Fleet Air Arm (FAA) of the Royal Navy defended the United Kingdom against large-scale attacks by Nazi Germany's air force, the Luftwaffe.
